price: 76. Lola ya edeni eye ezali kolekisa na nsé na yango mingala, libela kati na yango, mpe wana ekozala nde litomba ya baye bamipetolaki. (na boboyi kibopengwi na masumu)
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu man tazakkā
